## Profile

Welcome!

I am a PhD Candidate in empirical Economics at the Department of Economics, Ghent University, Belgium. 

My research focuses on methodologies to elicit beliefs (expectations) under uncertainty. I use experimental and survey methods, together with econometric techniques, to study how beliefs shape economic behavior across different domains. I am interested in applying these methods Environmental Economics, Labor Economics, and inflation expectations.
